section.title: Description
section.p: This tool lists users. This tool is a centralized version of lslogins. It runs on OAME nodes and distributes the operation to all the specified nodes. The options applicable to lslogins are directly passed to it. For information on lslogins options, see lslogins manual.

row.entry: Displays this help message and exits.
Specifies which host names (comma-separated) the operation is applied to. The internal IP addresses can also be used. Overrides -T.

entry.p: Specifies which node types (comma-separated) the operation is applied to.

li.p: for ME: all, auxiliary, cdr, comsvc, db, diameterapp, iohd, ioho and oame
for SM: all, auxiliary, db, ioho, oame and smapp

row.entry: Displays data in a format similar to /etc/passwd.
Displays in an export-able output format.
Displays data about the users' last failed logins.
Displays users belonging to a group in comma-separated groups.
Shows info about the users' last login sessions.
Displays each piece of information on a new line.
Displays information related to login by password.
Delimits user entries with a nul character.
Login disabled by nologin(8) or pam_nologin(8).
Date of the last password change.
Max number of days a password may remain unchanged.
Number of days required between changes.
Days the user is warned of password expiration.
Number of processes run by the user.

fig.codeblock:
[root@sps-me-oame-0 ~]# /opt/tpa/sbin/list-users -T all -uGa -l tpaadmin ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ auxiliary:
UID USER GID GROUP SUPP-GIDS SUPP-GROUPS PWD-WARN PWD-MIN PWD-MAX PWD-CHANGE PWD-EXPIR 1001 tpaadmin 1002 tpa 7 7 1969-Dec31 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ cdr:
UID USER GID GROUP SUPP-GIDS SUPP-GROUPS PWD-WARN PWD-MIN PWD-MAX PWD-CHANGE PWD-EXPIR 1001 tpaadmin 1002 tpa 7 7 1969-Dec31 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ comsvc:
UID USER GID GROUP SUPP-GIDS SUPP-GROUPS PWD-WARN PWD-MIN PWD-MAX PWD-CHANGE PWD-EXPIR 1001 tpaadmin 1002 tpa 1003 docker 7 7 1969-Dec31 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ db:
UID USER GID GROUP SUPP-GIDS SUPP-GROUPS PWD-WARN PWD-MIN PWD-MAX PWD-CHANGE PWD-EXPIR 1001 tpaadmin 1002 tpa 7 7 1969-Dec31 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ diameterapp:
UID USER GID GROUP SUPP-GIDS SUPP-GROUPS PWD-WARN PWD-MIN PWD-MAX PWD-CHANGE PWD-EXPIR 1001 tpaadmin 1002 tpa 7 7 1969-Dec31 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ iohd:
UID USER GID GROUP SUPP-GIDS SUPP-GROUPS PWD-WARN PWD-MIN PWD-MAX PWD-CHANGE PWD-EXPIR 1001 tpaadmin 1002 tpa 7 7 1969-Dec31 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ioho:
UID USER GID GROUP SUPP-GIDS SUPP-GROUPS PWD-WARN PWD-MIN PWD-MAX PWD-CHANGE PWD-EXPIR 1001 tpaadmin 1002 tpa 7 7 1969-Dec31 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ oame:
UID USER GID GROUP SUPP-GIDS SUPP-GROUPS PWD-WARN PWD-MIN PWD-MAX PWD-CHANGE PWD-EXPIR 1001 tpaadmin 1002 tpa 7 7 19:00:00 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ <2018.12.04 16:14:37 -0500><sps-me-oame-0><list-users> INFO: Done with success.
